member¶

Accessor to the related object on the forward side of a many-to-one or one-to-one (via ForwardOneToOneDescriptor subclass) relation.

In the example:

class Child(Model):
    parent = ForeignKey(Parent, related_name='children')

Child.parent is a ForwardManyToOneDescriptor instance.

congressmaster_set¶

Accessor to the related objects manager on the reverse side of a many-to-one relation.

In the example:

class Child(Model):
    parent = ForeignKey(Parent, related_name='children')

Parent.children is a ReverseManyToOneDescriptor instance.

Most of the implementation is delegated to a dynamically defined manager class built by create_forward_many_to_many_manager() defined below.

organisations.views module¶

organisations.views.org_detail_ajax(request)[source]¶

Returns basic info on an org for the generic org search.

Ajax call to get basic info on an org. Will return an empty json array if the org number is invalid.

Parameters

- org number (org_id) –

Returns

address etc.

Return type

Json array

organisations.views.org_search_ajax(request)[source]¶

Ajax org search function. Used by the generic org search.

Parameters

- partial org name to search for. (orgname) –

Returns

HttpResponse - either a message or a list of users in HTML format.
